word: H7280 - רָגַע - râgaʻ - raw-gah' - Break - உடை

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஒரு, ஸ்தாபி, இரு, வெடித்திரு, இளைப்பாறு, இளைப்பாறப் பண்ணு, குலுக்கு, அமரப்பண்ணு, ஒரு நிமிஷம், மாத்திரம், சடிதியில் பண்ணு
1) to act in an instant, to stir up, to disturb
a) (Qal) to stir up, to disturb
2) to rest or repose, to be at rest or repose, to settle, to quiet, to give rest
1) to cause to rest (used of the sword, used of the sea)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to toss violently and suddenly (the sea with waves, the skin with boils); figuratively (in a favorable manner) to settle, that is, quiet; specifically to wink (from the motion of the eye lids): - break, divide, find ease, be a moment, (cause, give, make to) rest, make suddenly.
Cognate: H4771, H4774, H7280, H7281, H7282
